name: They See You!
description:
You are a pilot that crashed at the unknown planet. You don't know when help will come. But you hear something around you. You look around and the unknown planet stares at you with thousands of hungry eyes...

This is the small game, that i've made within weekend. So, the gameplay is pretty simple.

Tips, Tricks & Features

-Your weapon has infinite ammunition, but it takes some time to refill it.

-There're several powerups that will spawn at some points of the map

-Killing enemies will increase character's experience. When you'll have enough experience, one of your stats will be increased.
